Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Cosmetic Pot Bearing a Relief of a Monkey
Description: This cosmetic pot bears a relief of a monkey climbing underneath the spout. Its tail is curled around the pot's flat bottom. The hands are to the left and right of the spout. Its head is turned to the right. On the other side of the pot there is a picture of two vultures, the heads of which form the base of the handle. The upper part of the monkey and the heads of the vultures are in relief. The fingers of the monkey and the vultures' wings are carved. The surface of the pot is polished.
